channel.title: Taronascape Development Team Help Wanted
channel.description:
ok to start off this my other development team from another friend of mines refused to help me on my dedicated server so ill need help on the server [font=Verdana][b]What is taronascape?[/b][/font] Taronascape Is well a private server of course and soon to become a source (if it gets finished) you have to use silabsoft to get into taronascape and be part of the development team [b]Current Goals[/b] Make Client and web based client made custom quests all skills working (including construction and summoning) Custom Items Nice Community with a supportive forum Much More.. [b]Application[/b] this is the application for to sign up the development team
Name: Age: Experience: Job Wanted: Years Of Programming: E-Mail Address: Why do you want this Job?:
[b]Open Jobs[/b] All Jobs are pretty much open so you are not too late to sign up [u]Co-Admin (Admin Of Forums)[/u] - - [u]Main Coders/Programmers[/u] - Mackel - - - [u]Debuggers (Anything strange or doesnt fit right fixers)[/u] - - - - [u]Networkers (people who have the runservers for taronascape so others can logg into multiple servers)[/u] - - - [u]Mods[/u] - - - - - [u]Quest Handler[/u] - - - [u]Forum Mods[/u] - - - [u]Item Makers, Interface, Skill Handlers [/u] - - - [u]Forum Designer/forum creator[/u] - - - Contact or pm me if you want your application personally here SpIfF4x7x8x3xx@aim.com Footnotes: if you don't have nothing nice to say about this post stay out of it cause i don't want spam about how "you should do it yourself" or "your being a little idiot or something like that" Thanks also note to get on you might need hamatchi im currently trying to port forward without hamatchi so yeah....in addition to make other people log into with out hamatchi i suggest you apply for networking Thanks

item.title: Taronascape Development Team Help Wanted
item.dc:creator: @mackel mackel
item.description:
@mackel wrote:

Name: Mike
Age: 14
Experience: I have coded my own source, soon to be public, and i’ve re-made a lot of already done sources
Job Wanted: Coder/programmer/Forum Admin/Forum mod.
Years Of Programming: 1 year in java, 1 year and some months in python, and couple of months in C++, and i have coded a couple of htmls, so im good if you need forum design
E-Mail Address: mik_rules_3@hotmail.com
Why do you want this Job?: To keep myself occupied, to help out your forum and you server, to have people saying your server owns before even they experience a little bit of it, and to basically do what you ask of me :P:D

Read full topic

item.title: Taronascape Development Team Help Wanted
item.dc:creator: @Ncarug01 Ncarug01
item.description:
@Ncarug01 wrote:

ok to start off this my other development team from another friend of mines refused to help me on my dedicated server so ill need help on the server

[font=Verdana]What is taronascape?[/font] Taronascape Is well a private server of course and soon to become a source (if it gets finished)

you have to use silabsoft to get into taronascape and be part of the development team

Current Goals
Make Client and web based client
made custom quests
all skills working (including construction and summoning)
Custom Items
Nice Community with a supportive forum
Much More…

Application this is the application for to sign up the development team

Name: Age: Experience: Job Wanted: Years Of Programming: E-Mail Address: Why do you want this Job?:

Open Jobs
All Jobs are pretty much open so you are not too late to sign up

Co-Admin (Admin Of Forums)

Main Coders/Programmers

  • Mackel

Debuggers (Anything strange or doesnt fit right fixers)

Networkers (people who have the runservers for taronascape so others can logg into multiple servers)

Mods

Quest Handler

Forum Mods

Item Makers, Interface, Skill Handlers

Forum Designer/forum creator

Contact or pm me if you want your application personally here

SpIfF4x7x8x3xx@aim.com

Footnotes: if you don’t have nothing nice to say about this post stay out of it cause i don’t want spam about how “you should do it yourself” or “your being a little idiot or something like that” Thanks also note to get on you might need hamatchi
im currently trying to port forward without hamatchi so yeah…in addition to make other people log into with out hamatchi i suggest you apply for networking

Thanks

Read full topic
